trans-unit.source: Provides data for several of the events that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Stylus" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para vários eventos associados à classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Stylus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> class provides data for the following events:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> classe fornece dados para os seguintes eventos:

trans-unit.source: (as well as equivalent events declared on the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> class).
trans-unit.target: (bem como equivalentes eventos declarados no <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> classe).

trans-unit.source: The stylus to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: A caneta a ser associada ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that the (<c>x</c>, <c>y</c>) coordinates are mapped to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> para o qual as coordenadas (<c>x</c>, <c>y</c>) são mapeadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição da caneta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the position of the stylus, based on the coordinates of <paramref name="relativeTo" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> que representa a posição da caneta com base nas coordenadas de <paramref name="relativeTo" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects collected in the event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> coletados no evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> to which the (<c>x,y</c>) coordinates in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> para o qual as coordenadas (<c>x, y</c>) em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> são mapeadas.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects relative to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> que contém objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> em relação ao elemento de entrada especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects collected in the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> coletados no evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> is neither <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> não é <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> nem <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> to which the (<c>x,y</c>) coordinates in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> para o qual as coordenadas (<c>x, y</c>) em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> são mapeadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to be used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> a ser usado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that uses the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> and contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects relating to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> que usa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> especificado e contém objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> com relação ao elemento de entrada especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects collected during an event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> coletados durante um evento.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo` deve ser compatível com o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> método.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> método para obter um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription%29> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> uses constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> usa restrições do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> na <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, mesmo se as restrições em `subsetToReformatTo` são diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> values of 0 and 1023 but <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> uses values of 0 and 255, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> containing the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `subsetToReformatTo` usa <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> valores de 0 a 1023 mas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> usa valores de 0 e 255, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> que contém os valores 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> is neither <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> não é <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> nem <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a caneta está próxima ao digitalizador, mas não o está tocando.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a caneta está no proximidade, mas não tocar o digitalizador; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus in inverted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a caneta está invertida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is inverted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a caneta é invertida; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador genérico a ser chamado de uma forma específica ao tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: O destino no qual chamar o manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Invoca manipuladores de eventos em uma forma específica de tipo, o que pode aumentar a eficiência do sistema de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação converte o manipulador genérico como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler> e, em seguida, invoca.

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre esse padrão de implementação e os motivos para ele, consulte <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> e [visão geral sobre eventos roteados](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> que representa a caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> que representa a caneta.
